group_1.narration: Night after night, my sister regaled me@with many stories.

group_1.textRight: He has a hammer called Mjolnir,@and he can control lightning as well...
But just how strong is he?

group_1.textLeft: He's the one who beats Thrym,@the king of the Jötunn​!
Loki, the mischievous god, is always playing@tricks on him…
In spite of that, though, Thor and Loki@are good buddies.

group_1.narration: My sister loved stories about the gods.
And I loved hearing her tell me those legends.
I loved it when she talked about her dream.

group_1.textLeft: So before anything else, we gotta get a ship…

group_1.textRight: Yes, it won't be possible without one.
Your dream is to travel across@the world after all…

group_1.textLeft: And when I get my ship, you'll be on board@with me, right?

group_1.textRight: I'll help you fulfill your dream, Sis!
So when you get your boat…
You'll stand at the bow, yes?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:104902:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Huh?!@You mean I'm gonna be the stafnbúi?

group_1.textRight: But of course!@You'll be the boat's owner, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: I dunno if I can manage that, though…

group_1.textRight: If our father could do it, so can you!
Have no fear!@I'll be right by your side!

group_1.narration: The stafnbúi...@It refers to the bravest person on the boat,@who stands upon the ship's prow…@That's Olga for sure.
She never gave up, even after becoming a thrall.@She was always upbeat and cheered me up,@easing the pain that ate at me day after day.
I want to be a useful sister to her...@and help her achieve her dreams.
Despite my feelings, however,@the days passed by without change.
If I don't do something soon,@we'll be doomed to be thralls forever...
Her dream is still so far out of reach...
